goal.summary.title: Summary
goal.summary.base: The goal will be deemed successfully achieved when the {{metric}} {{goalDescription}}. The evaluation will take place on {{measurementTime}}.
goal.ranged.between.description: falls within the range of {{value0}} and {{value1}}, excluding both the upper and lower limits
goal.ranged.notBetween.description: does not fall within the range of {{value0}} and {{value1}}. If the result is equal to either the lower or the upper bound it's considered failed
goal.ranged.range.description: falls within the range of {{value0}} and {{value1}}, excluding the lower bound. If the result is greater than the lower bound the goal is considered to be linearly reached up to a final value greater than or equal to the upper bound of the range
